solution.text:
To calculate the median, we need to find the cumulative frequency.
As follows:
\begin{array}{c|lcr} interval & \text{frequency} & \text{Cumulative frequency} \\ \hline \ 0-10 & _{i}_ & _{i}_ \\ \hline \ 10-20 & _{j}_ & _{{i+j}}_ \\ \hline \ 20-30 & _{k}_ & _{{i+j+k}}_ \\ \hline \ 30-40 & x & _{{i+j+k}}_+x \\ \hline \ 40-50 & _{m}_ & _{{i+j+k+m}}_+x \\ \hline \ 50-60 & y & _{{i+j+k+m}}_+x+y \\ \hline \ 60-70 & _{l}_ & _{{i+j+k+l+m}}_+x+y \\ \hline \end{array}
It is given that n = _{{i+j+k+l+m+12}}_So, _{{i+j+k+l+m}}_ + x + y = _{{i+j+k+l+m+12}}_,
i.e., x + y = 12 ------ (1)
The median is 44, which lies in the class (40 - 50)
So, l = 40, f = _{m}_, cf = _{{i+j+k}}_+x , h = 10
Using formula:
Median = l +\({{({n\over 2} - cf})\over {f}}\)*h
Median = 40 +\({{({_{{i+j+k+l+m+12}}_\over 2} - (_{{i+j+k}}_+x)})\over _{m}_}\)*10
Median = 40 +\({({_{{(i+j+k+l+m+12)/2}}_ - (_{{i+j+k}}_+x)})\over _{m}_}\)*10
Median = 40 +\({({_{{((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k)}}_-x})\over _{m}_}\)*10
44 = 40 +\({({_{{((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k)}}_-x})\over _{m}_}\)*10
_{{44-40}}_ = \({({_{{((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k)}}_-x})\over _{m}_}\)*10
_{{Decimal(44-40)/10}}_ = \({({_{{((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k)}}_-x})\over _{m}_}\)
_{{(Decimal(44-40)/10)*m}}_ = \({({_{{((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k)}}_-x})}\)
x = _{{(((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k))-((Decimal(44-40)/10)*m)}}_
Round off the value of x.
x = _{{trunc((((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k))-((Decimal(44-40)/10)*m),0)}}_
x + y = 12
_{{trunc((((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k))-((Decimal(44-40)/10)*m),0)}}_ + y = 12
y = 12 - _{{trunc((((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k))-((Decimal(44-40)/10)*m),0)}}_
y = _{{12-(trunc((((i+j+k+l+m+12)/2)-(i+j+k))-((Decimal(44-40)/10)*m),0))}}_

content.text:
The median of the following data is 44. Find the values of x and y, if the total frequency is _{{i+j+k+l+m+12}}_.
\begin{array}{c|lcr} interval & \text{frequency} \\ \hline \ 0-10 & _{i}_ \\ \hline \ 10-20 & _{j}_ \\ \hline \ 20-30 & _{k}_ \\ \hline \ 30-40 & x \\ \hline \ 40-50 & _{m}_ \\ \hline \ 50-60 & y \\ \hline \ 60-70 & _{l}_ \\ \hline \end{array}
